title: Claude-Code - Lstool.Js
prompt_text: var jc2 = `Write a file to the local filesystem. Overwrites the existing file if there is one. Before using this tool: 1. Use the ReadFile tool to understand the file's contents and context 2. Directory Verification (only applicable when creating new files): - Use the LS tool to verify the parent directory exists and is the correct location`;
usage_example: Use as system prompt for Claude-Code
